articles.title: Doctor Who casts Sex Education’s Ncuti Gatwa as 14th Doctor - Polygon
articles.description: After nearly 60 years, the new Doctor in Doctor Who will be a Black man. Sex Education’s Ncuti Gatwa will take on the role for the 2023 season, just as the first female Doctor Who, Jodie Whittaker, steps down from the role.
articles.content: After Jodie Whittaker, who served as Doctor Whos leadfor 32 episodes, steps down as the 13th Doctor, Ncuti Gatwa will regenerate as number 14. The Doctor Who websitebroke the news on Sunday afternoon… [+1380 chars]

articles.title: The 2022 New Orleans Jazz Fest's final Sunday wasn't always easy, but it worked - NOLA.com
